Detailed Description

Back light device.

Led is the APOXI device abstraction interface for LED hardware driver.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Led::Notification
 

This information is part of LedNotificationMsg.

Enumerator:
StreamFinished 
StreamStopped  LED streaming has finished.
StreamError  An error occurred while streaming.

enum Led::Peripheral
 

Defines all available LED's in a bit field.

Enumerator:
Keyboard 
Display 
InService 
All

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN Led::ChangeColor (  Peripheral  peripheral,
Color  color
)  [static]
 

Is used to change the color immediately for all LED's defined by parameter peripheral.

BOOLEAN Led::ColorStream (  Peripheral  peripheral,
const Stream *  stream,
INT  sequence_id = 0
)  [static]
 

Starts a color stream with specific timing parameters for each color. See Led::Stream.

Parameters:
sequence_id Is passed via LedNotificationMsg.

BOOLEAN Led::MusicMode (  Peripheral  peripheral,
BOOLEAN  on
)  [static]
 

Starts or stops the music mode for the LED.

BOOLEAN Led::Off (  Peripheral  peripheral,
UINT32  fading_time
)  [static]
 

Turns off all LED's defined by parameter peripheral.

BOOLEAN Led::On (  Peripheral  peripheral,
Frame  frame
)  [static]
 

Turns on all LED's defined by parameter peripheral using the Frame sequence.

virtual void Led::OnStart (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is invoked by the DeviceManager when the system is started. The device must attach itself to the DeviceManager by invoking DeviceManager::AddDevice(*this) in its constructor.

Reimplemented from AbstractDevice.

void Led::Reset (   )  [static]
 

Turns off all LED's immediately.
